physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Hypothyroidism diagnosed at neonatal screening; athyreosis suggested on neck ultrasound.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: At 17 months, the patient was clinically euthyroid with unremarkable physical examination. Thyroid function tests were consistently normal during follow-up.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient developed normally on L-thyroxine treatment.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Continued euthyroid status with adjustments in L-thyroxine dosage based on age and weight.
